Class SciencesDatabase

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.io.SciencesDatabase
public class SciencesDatabase extends Object
Parser and accessor for the sciences taxonomy database.

Data source: Stephen Chrisomalis (2004), licensed for personal use with attribution. Database contains 600+ scientific disciplines from acarology to zoology.

Usage example:

Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

  • Method Details

    • find

      public static Optional<SciencesDatabase.Science> find(String name)
      Finds a science by exact name match (case-insensitive).

      Complexity: O(1) after initial load

      Parameters:
      name - science name (case-insensitive)
      Returns:
      Optional containing the science if found

    • search

      public static List<SciencesDatabase.Science> search(String keyword)
      Searches for sciences containing the keyword in name or description.

      Complexity: O(n) where n is number of sciences (~600)

      Parameters:
      keyword - search term (case-insensitive)
      Returns:
      list of matching sciences (may be empty)

    • getAll

      public static Collection<SciencesDatabase.Science> getAll()
      Gets all sciences in the database.

      Returns unmodifiable collection of all 600+ sciences.

      Returns:
      all sciences

    • count

      public static int count()
      Gets the number of sciences in the database.
      Returns:
      count (typically 600+)
